name: Sparrow
intro: Innovative Digital Asset Solutions in Singapore
introduce: Sparrow offers a digital assets trading platform that endeavors to comply with the highest regulatory and cybersecurity standards. Sparrow also provides innovative structured products and white-labeled products in Singapore with a focus on digital asset solutions designed to meet the needs of institutional and accredited clients. Furthermore, Sparrow has obtained the Major Payment Institution (MPI) licence from the Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) to provide Digital Payment Token (DPT) services in Singapore under the Payment Services Act (PSA).
